metadata.description: For a time the nightmares had left Nathan Cross. After he destroyed Pan and his hold on Neverland he was able to sleep at night. But now the nightmares have returned...and so has something else. People are starting to disappear again and Cross knows that evil lives in Neverland again. Zenescope presents the second series in its hit Grimm Fairy Tales spinoff, Neverland.
metadata.name: Neverland - Hook
